item.title: VBA Excel
item.description: Read Data from a Closed Excel File or Workbook Find last row and column of range Loop Through Visible Filtered Rows Read Data from a Closed Excel File or Workbook Option Explicit Private Sub Workbook_Open() Call ReadDataFromCloseFile End Sub Sub ReadDataFromCloseFile() On Error GoTo ErrHandler Application.ScreenUpdating = False Dim src As Workbook ' OPEN THE SOURCE EXCEL WORKBOOK IN "READ ONLY MODE".
